creator: Change Finance
descriptionHtml:
Invest, trade, and spend with six of the leading cryptocurrencies on the market. Users from twenty-eight European countries trust Change to trade millions of euros each month without paying commission.

Change uses the best rates possible to help both new and experienced investors in making higher-quality trades every time - all while ensuring personal and transactional security are held to the highest standard. Bitcoin, Litecoin, Ethereum, Ripple, Stellar, EOS, Bitcoin Cash, and Dash can all be purchased and traded within seconds.


• Trusted: Change is an EU regulated crypto-asset service provider
• Secure: Funds are protected in multi-signature, cold-storage cryptocurrency wallets
• Support: Our dedicated team guarantees a quick and helpful response

Use Change to:
• Buy and sell Bitcoin, Litecoin, Ethereum, Dash, XRP, Stellar, EOS, Bitcoin Cash and USDT
• Pay by card in over 40 million locations worldwide
• Unlimited commission-free trades
• Send money to friends, family, and businesses that accept crypto
• Get paid in Bitcoin (other options to come!)
• Earn rewards for every friend you invite
• Receive price alert notifications when significant price changes occur
• Get Market signals for a better understanding of the market
• Receive related crypto news in the app


Currently, our services allow for the easy depositing of euros by SEPA bank transfer. An initial deposit in euro is required to hold an account with Change and also to receive and send Bitcoin. The invite-and-earn program is also open to qualified users who’ve verified their account and made a deposit. In order to obtain the payment card a deposit of 10 euros must be made to qualify.

Change is currently available for most citizens and residents of the European Economic Area. Currently, Change is able to offer trades for Bitcoin, Litecoin, Ethereum, Dash, XRP, Stellar, EOS, Bitcoin Cash, and USDT.
descriptionShort: Secure crypto wallet & card

title: Change Invest: Buy & Sell Bitcoin Commission-free

creator: Change Finance
descriptionHtml:
Change is a European based, commission-free cryptocurrency service provider that makes it simple and easy to trade, invest, buy and sell 17 of the leading cryptocurrencies on the market (Bitcoin, Litecoin, Ethereum, Ripple, Stellar, EOS, Bitcoin Cash, Tezos, Cardano, Dash and more). Invest and trade your personal capital and digital currency safely and securely with a trusted crypto blockchain wallet without paying commission.

Users from 28 European countries trust Change to buy, sell, and trade millions of euros worth of cryptocurrency each month. Here’s why:
✔️ Invest and trade the world’s most popular cryptocurrency: Bitcoin, Litecoin, Ethereum, Ripple, Stellar, EOS, Bitcoin Cash, Tezos, Cardano, Dash and more;
✔️ Change offers the best exchange rates possible to buy, sell, and trade cryptocurrency;
✔️ Our dedicated support team has got you covered whether you’re a crypto novice or a seasoned bitcoin trader;
✔️ We are an EU regulated, cryptocurrency blockchain virtual wallet service provider;
✔️ Your funds are protected in multi-signature, cold-storage cryptocurrency wallets. We uphold your trust and your digital money;
✔️ Commission free trade of Bitcoin;
✔️ Pay by card in over 40 million locations worldwide;
✔️ Send crypto quickly to friends, family, and businesses;
✔️ Monitor chart prices and receive cryptocurrency price alert notifications when significant price changes occur. Change app market watch never sleeps;
✔️ Get Market signals for a better understanding of specific crypto markets;
✔️ Receive related crypto news in the app.

Change is a safe and simple cryptocurrency wallet, ensuring secure buying, selling, investing, and trading of cryptocurrencies. Purchase and invest in BTC, LTC, ETH, and more.

Currently, our services allow for the easy depositing of euros by SEPA bank transfer. An initial deposit in euro is required to hold an account with Change and also to receive and send Bitcoin as well as to deposit by debit or credit card. In order to obtain the payment card, a deposit of 10 euros must be made.

Change is currently available for most citizens and residents of the European Economic Area. Currently, Change is able to offer trades for Bitcoin, Litecoin, Ethereum, Dash, XRP, Stellar, EOS, Bitcoin Cash, Basic Attention Token, Cardano, Tezos, Algorand, Augur, Cosmos, and USDT.

Safe and commission-free investing is made possible with Change! Download the Change app to stay informed on all crypto news and to receive our weekly newsletter.

✔️ Change offers the best exchange rates possible to buy, sell, and trade cryptocurrency;
✔️ Our dedicated support team has got you covered whether you’re a crypto novice or a seasoned bitcoin trader;

✔️ Get Market signals for a better understanding of specific crypto markets;

Change is a safe and simple cryptocurrency wallet, ensuring secure buying, selling, investing, and trading of cryptocurrencies. Purchase and invest in BTC, LTC, ETH, and more.

Currently, our services allow for the easy depositing of euros by SEPA bank transfer. An initial deposit in euro is required to hold an account with Change and also to receive and send Bitcoin as well as to deposit by debit or credit card. In order to obtain the payment card, a deposit of 10 euros must be made.

Change is currently available for most citizens and residents of the European Economic Area. Currently, Change is able to offer trades for Bitcoin, Litecoin, Ethereum, Dash, XRP, Stellar, EOS, Bitcoin Cash, Basic Attention Token, Cardano, Tezos, Algorand, Augur, Cosmos, and USDT.

title: Change: Crypto Wallet to Buy Sell & Trade Bitcoin

creator: Change Finance
descriptionHtml:
Between 74-89% of retail investor accounts lose money when trading CFDs. You should consider whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing your money.

Description

● Simple: enjoy our beginner-friendly trading and investment app.
● Affordable: start as low as €10 to buy & sell CFD commission-free.
● Safe: secure your funds with the trusted, EU licensed provider.

Ready to change your financial future? Download the app now!
______________________________________________
Our mission is to make trading and investing equally accessible to everyone and allow you to take part in the world’s success. Users from 27 European countries trust Change to buy, sell, and trade millions of euros worth of Bitcoin and crypto CFDs each month. Here’s why:
✔️ You pay no commission on buying and selling Bitcoin as well as trading crypto CFDs.
✔️ You get the best exchange rates possible to buy, sell, and trade a wide variety of popular altcoins such as Etherium, Tether, Ripple, Chainlink, Litecoin, Polkadot, Cardano and many more.
✔️ You trade with a fully regulated service provider with a world-class compliance programme.
✔️ Your funds are protected in a multi-signature wallet and held only with reputable EU financial institutions.
✔️ You get a VISA debit card with no monthly fee and free EUR payments in over 40 million locations worldwide.

Safe commission-free trading and investing are just one tap away. Download the Change app and start today.
-------------------------
Cryptoasset services are provided by xChange AS under virtual currency service provider license no FVT000072 issued by Estonian FIU.

Getchange Account and Visa Card is issued by UAB Finansinės paslaugos “Contis” (company code 304406236) a member of Visa and authorised by the Bank of Lithuania under the electronic money institution license no 53.

CFD Trading service is provided on a cross-border basis by Indexa B.V. (Chamber of Commerce no 50755854, previously Optieclub.nl B.V.) authorised and regulated by the Dutch Authority for the Financial Markets (AFM).

Thanks to the easy-to-use Change application, you will never lose the opportunity to make transactions and earn money, you will be able to monitor your crypto wallet or track Bitcoin quotations, you will gain easy access to cryptocurrency, Bitcoin alerts, crypto news and current stock market statements.
The Bitcoin exchange and other cryptocurrencies such as Ethereum, Litecoin, Cardano and ETH have gained worldwide popularity thanks to the possibility of quick profit, relatively simple mechanisms of operation and, above all, equal opportunities for everyone, both professional and novice investors. 📍 Intuitive interface that will facilitate the work of beginners and experienced investors. Whether you are just starting your crypto adventure or are a seasoned expert, you will find everything you need to build your Bitcoin wallet at Change.
📍Stock exchange, crypto lists, crypto news, Bitcoin alerts, the most popular cryptocurrency - Bitcoin and many others always on your smartphone,
📍Crypto wallet always at your fingertips.
📍You pay no commission on buying and selling Bitcoin as well as trading other crypto.
📍You benefit from the best possible Bitcoin exchange rates to buy Bitcoin, sell and trade a wide variety of popular cryptocurrency such as Ethereum, Tether, Litecoin, Cardano, Stellar and many more.
📍You conduct your transactions with a fully regulated service provider with a world-class compliance program and the security of a trusted blockchain wallet.
📍You get a VISA debit card with no monthly fees and free euro payments in over 40 million locations worldwide.

Ready to invest in Bitcoin and other cryptocurrency and change your financial future? Here’s why you should invest with Change: Bitcoin & Crypto Wallet:

💠Security and certainty of investment. You invest with a fully regulated service provider with a stellar compliance program.

Thanks to the crypto blockchain wallet service, you will always have easy access to your funds, and at the same time you can be sure that they are well protected and stored in reputable financial institutions in the European Union.
💠VISA debit card with no commission. Gain mobility and free euro payments at over 40 million ATMs around the world.

How do you start using Change: Bitcoin & Crypto Wallet?
You don't have to get into debt to start investing. With Change: Bitcoin & Crypto Wallet you only need to make a first deposit of just EUR 10 and you can start trading and selling Bitcoin and many other cryptocurrencies. It's really that simple!
Invest. Exchange. Earn. Save.

💠Best crypto exchange rates. Bitcoin cryptocurrency, Ethereum, Ripple, USDT, Litecoin, Bitcoin Cash, Cardano and many other popular crypto at the best rates!
💠Cryptocurrency blockchain wallet. Choose the security and certainty of keeping funds. Thanks to the crypto blockchain wallet service, your funds are well protected.
💠VISA debit card with no commission. Gain mobility and free euro payments at over 40 million ATMs around the world.

How do you start using Change: Bitcoin & Crypto Wallet?
You don't have to get into debt to start investing. With Change: Bitcoin & Crypto Wallet you only need to make a first deposit of just EUR 10 and you can start trading and selling Bitcoin and many other cryptocurrencies. It's really that simple!
Invest. Exchange. Earn. Save.

title: Change: Simple Investment App

creator: Change Finance
descriptionHtml:
It's time for Change!

Change is on a mission to remove the barriers and complexities to wealth creation.

Start trading today: buy and sell Bitcoin with zero fees. Change makes investing your money in Bitcoin and over 50 altcoins simple. Diversify your portfolio with investment gold, indices and commodities, or earn passively on your euros with Growth Pocket - get started from just €10.

Discover the competitive rates to buy, sell and trade cryptos within a wide variety of popular altcoins such as Ethereum, Tether, Cardano, Solana, Litecoin, Polkadot, Avalanche, and many more.

Download the Change app now for a user-friendly investing experience and excellent customer support.

Change is:
● Simple: enjoy our beginner-friendly trading and investment app
● Affordable: start as low as €10 in your wallet to buy & sell assets commission-free
● Secure: trust your funds and trade with an EU-licensed provider

Grow Your Savings with Growth Pocket:
● Ensure that your portfolio is constantly growing, even when you sleep
● 7% annual reward-earning option helps you beat the inflation
● Available to all verified Change customers
● Accrue rewards hourly and get paid monthly
● No locked funds. You can start earning rewards anytime

Spend Any Asset:
● Use your investor-friendly VISA card in over 40M locations worldwide
● No monthly fee and free euro payments
● Pay with the assets in your portfolio: cryptos, euros or gold
● No hassle with transferring the money between Change and your bank account

Are you ready to change your financial future? Put your money to work and start investing, trading, and earning. Download the Change app today!

Users from 30 European countries trust Change to buy, sell and trade millions of euros worth of Bitcoin and Cryptos each month.

Here's why:
● You will pay no commissions on buying and selling Bitcoin as well as easily trade altcoins, metals and indices
● You get competitive fees to buy, sell and trade a wide variety of popular altcoins such as Ethereum, Tether, Cardano, Solana, Litecoin, Polkadot, and many more
● You can use a VISA debit card with no monthly fee and free euro payments in over 40 million locations worldwide
● You will trade crypto with a fully-regulated service provider with a world-class compliance programme
● Your funds are protected in a multi-signature wallet and held only with reputable EU financial institutions

With Change, you can start trading and investing with as little as €10.

Get more value for your money when investing & trading with us. Join over 100,000 users across Europe using our simple, beginner-friendly mobile app. Change offers an unbeatable crypto experience with low fees and a whole new world of trustworthy, commission-free trading and investing.

Download the Change app and start today.

https://www.changeinvest.com/

LIKE US on Facebook
https://www.facebook.com/changeinvest/

FOLLOW US on Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn and TikTok

● Simple: enjoy our beginner-friendly trading and investment app

Ready to change your financial future? Download the app now!
______________________________________________
Our mission is to make trading and investing equally accessible to everyone and allow you to take part in the world’s success. Users from 30 European countries trust Change to buy, sell, and trade millions of euros worth of Bitcoin and crypto CFDs each month.

title: Change: Change: Invest & Trade

creator: Change Finance
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Change - a lighting fast investment app chosen by 125,000 investors across the EU. This secure platform lets you trade indices, oil, gold CFDs with leverage. Invest in Stocks* and ETFs with one app. Get a VISA debit card and low trading fees.

INVEST AND TRADE WITH LOW FEES
Open an account today and start investing from as little as €10. Deposits are fast and free for SEPA and cards.

DIVERSIFY YOUR PORTFOLIO WITH 450+ ASSETS
Explore financial markets around the world. Take advantage of short-term opportunities or hold positions for a longer period. Change makes asset diversification easy.

FOR BEGINNERS AND SKILLED TRADERS
Easy-to-use trading app is suitable both for beginners and experienced traders. CFDs allow you to invest in a fraction of a stock or an ETF and trade with up to 20x leverage, increasing your potential outcomes with the same amount of capital.

SAFE AND SECURE
Change is fully regulated and available in 30 countries across the European Economic Area (EEA).

JOIN OUR COMMUNITY OF INVESTORS
Get access to unique community trading ideas directly from your Change app, share your voice and learn from other investors. Explore trading and investing tips from experienced traders and discuss the latest market topics. Catch up with daily news and updates from the markets to level up your financial knowledge and improve your trading skills.

GET A VISA DEBIT CARD
We understand that flexibility is key when managing your finances, which is why we also offer a VISA debit card. Pay with EUR in over 40 million locations across the world.

SUPPORT ON YOUR JOURNEY
With real-time market data and analysis, you can stay on top of your investments and make informed decisions. Our app also offers first-class customer support, so you can get help whenever you need it.

Download Change: Invest & Trade today and start taking control of your financial future!

Visit our website:
changeinvest.com
______________________________________

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hey, Changemakers! We’ve updated a homepage to let you unlock a world of investments hassle-free!
Look up! Look down! Look all-around. If you didn’t see any bugs, it’s because we just got rid of ’em for you with this last update (they were too tiny to talk about, but you’ll be happy to know they’re gone).

Open an account today and start investing from as little as €10. Deposits are fast and free for SEPA and cards.

DIVERSIFY YOUR PORTFOLIO WITH 450+ ASSETS
Explore financial markets around the world. Take advantage of short-term opportunities or hold positions for a longer period. Change makes asset diversification easy.

FOR BEGINNERS AND SKILLED TRADERS
Easy-to-use trading app is suitable both for beginners and experienced traders. CFDs allow you to invest in a fraction of a stock or an ETF and trade with up to 20x leverage, increasing your potential outcomes with the same amount of capital.

SAFE AND SECURE
Change is fully regulated and available in 30 countries across the European Economic Area (EEA).

JOIN OUR COMMUNITY OF INVESTORS
Get access to unique community trading ideas directly from your Change app, share your voice and learn from other investors. Explore trading and investing tips from experienced traders and discuss the latest market topics. Catch up with daily news and updates from the markets to level up your financial knowledge and improve your trading skills.

GET A VISA DEBIT CARD
We understand that flexibility is key when managing your finances, which is why we also offer a VISA debit card. Pay with EUR in over 40 million locations across the world.

SUPPORT ON YOUR JOURNEY
With real-time market data and analysis, you can stay on top of your investments and make informed decisions. Our app also offers first-class customer support, so you can get help whenever you need it.

Download Change: Invest & Trade today and start taking control of your financial future!

Visit our website:
changeinvest.com
______________________________________

66% of retail investor accounts lose money when trading CFDs with this provider. You should consider whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing your money.

CFD Trading service is provided on a cross-border basis by Change Securities B.V. (Chamber of Commerce no 50755854), authorised and regulated by the Dutch Authority for the Financial Markets (AFM).

Digital asset services are provided by xChange AS under virtual currency service provider license no FVT000072 issued by Estonian FIU.

Getchange Account and Visa Card is issued by UAB Finansinės paslaugos “Contis” (company code 304406236) a member of Visa and authorised by the Bank of Lithuania under the electronic money institution license no 53.
